question: Who launched the host city logo for Kochi, one of the venues of FIFA U-17 World Cup India 2017?
explanation: Kerala Chief Minister Shri Pinarayi Vijayan launched the host city logo for Kochi, one of the venues of FIFA U-17 World Cup India 2017. The logo represents and reflects Kochi's identity and will be a valuable tool in linking the local community in a global World Cup. It is the first Indian city to be officially declared as one of the venues for hosting the 2017 FIFA U-17 World Cup.
